Become a Member

Join or renew your membership

Before making the commitment to active membership we recommend getting to know us first. Come to a workday, or stop by and ask any gardener you see what active membership is like.

When you are ready, please take the time to read the Membership Agreement in detail.

Active Membership

Benefits
  • Harvesting crops
  • Tool lending/borrowing privileges
  • Your voice in Ranch decision making
  • Private party access (for groups of max. 20 with prior approval)
Requirements
  • Volunteer six (6) Hours per month
  • Active participation on a minimum of one (1) committee
  • Hosting/Co-Hosting two (2) workdays/events per year
  • Attendance of at least three (3) membership meetings per year
Student
$20
per year

$20 is tax deductible

Individual
$35
per year

$35 is tax deductible

Family
$60
per month

$60 is tax deductible

Patron Membership

Ideal for those who can't make the regular service commitment

All levels include:
  • Stay up to date through our newsletter
  • Receive an unique token of Thank You appreciation gift from the Ranch
Individual
$70
per year
  • Attendance of at least one (1) membership meeting
  • Attendance of at least one (1) volunteer event per year

$70 is tax deductible

Join/Renew
Family
$120
per month
    • Attendance of at least one (1) membership meeting
    • Attendance of at least one (1) volunteer event per year

$120 is tax deductible

Join/Renew

Corporate Patron

$250+ per year

$250+ is tax deductible
